name: The Radio Incident
description:
This is a game about a radio, a radio that talks to you, a radio that seems friendly because everytime you pass one of its tests it gives you some money for you to decorate your room. Just obey the radio.

If you like puzzle story-driven games, you will like The Radio Incident a free non-commercial one man team game:

  • Decorate the room with the ingame  money you earn.
  • Explore the 7 radio stations featuring synthwave, hiphop, DreamPop, FutureFunk, Lo-Fi and Classical plus an extra experimenntal radio made by the artist Dijomen (Search for it on Spotify, he's great). 
  • Find out all the 4 endings, while solving the mistery behind that strange radio.

IMPORTANT: The game is absolutely free-to-play. You are not required to donate any money, but your contributions are always greatly appreciated!
